ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] RE: Givin' up on love and everything
ygData.msgSnippet: However everyone needs love :) I think I will propose to Su :p **gets on one knee** Su, Will you be my RL spouse Will you agree to network our machines
ygData.messageBody:
However everyone needs love :)
I think I will propose to Su :p
**gets on one knee**
Su,
Will you be my RL spouse
Will you agree to network our machines together
to cover each other, in and out of Norrath
Will you PL my weak characters to your level so I can
assist in covering your butt

**waits for her response**

the big problem comes if the answer is yes
who's server do we move to :p

> Thanks for sharing. :-)
> Glad things worked out for you in the end. :-)
> I'm stuck on the farm taking care of my animals so I
> can't go to conventions
> and stuff.
> I'm a low energy person. I do not have the energy to deal
> with people all
> the time. Nor do I have the desire to expend energy to
> work on a
> relationship. I'm just extremely lazy. Too lazy to bother
> with a
> relationship. And I don't feel any need to find someone.
> I like things the
> way they are.
> luv,
> -Su
